LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Ash.label: Prodromos Miho Ash Hair
LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Ash.description: Carriers of this gene have ash grey hair color.
LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Pink.label: Miho Pink Hair
LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Pink.description: Carriers of this gene have pink hair color.
LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Orange.label: Miho Orange Hair
LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Orange.description: Carriers of this gene have orange hair color.
LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Red.label: Miho Red Hair
LanguageData.Hair_Miho_Red.description: Carriers of this gene have red hair color.
LanguageData.Ears_Arctic_Miho.label: Arkitos Miho Ears
LanguageData.Ears_Arctic_Miho.description: Carriers of this gene have Arkitos Miho ears.
LanguageData.Ears_Desert_Miho.label: Konis Miho Ears
LanguageData.Ears_Desert_Miho.description: Carriers of this gene have Konis Miho ears.
LanguageData.Ears_Highland_Miho.label: Prodromos Miho Ears
LanguageData.Ears_Highland_Miho.description: Carriers of this gene have Prodromos Miho ears.
LanguageData.Ears_Highmate_Miho.label: Porne Miho Ears
LanguageData.Ears_Highmate_Miho.description: Carriers of this gene have Porne Miho ears.
LanguageData.Gene_CelestialMiho.label: Celestial Fox
LanguageData.Gene_CelestialMiho.description: Carriers of this gene seem to be protected by the stars. It's not verified though.
LanguageData.Gene_Miho_AdvancedAuditory.label: Advanced Hearing
LanguageData.Gene_Miho_AdvancedAuditory.description: Carriers of this gene have increased social skills and short-ranged shooting hit rates. However their long-range shooting ability is reduced
LanguageData.Gene_Miho_Naked.label: Perfect Body
LanguageData.Gene_Miho_Naked.description: Carriers of this gene have increased social skills and attractiveness when not wearing clothes.
